name: Flores

biography.description: Flores uses the RCE-Ratero Charge to scout and destroy gadgets or soft surfaces, providing tactical advantages for his team.

gameplayTips: Use the RCE-Ratero Charge to clear defender gadgets and create openings in soft walls.
Coordinate with teammates to maximize the impact of your gadget's destruction capabilities.
Be mindful of the gadget's timing and placement to avoid wasting its potential.
